name: favoritesport
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fav sport
des: The alexa skill favorite sport ask the user for his/her favorite sport. I created a intent named FavoriteSportIntent which captures the users favorite sport and say it will remember the users' favorite sport and thank them for using the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
